title: The Tiny Knight's Ascent to the Cloud Castle
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, high resolution, stunning 3D render, Pixar style cinematic animation, (9:16 aspect ratio), a majestic medieval castle standing dramatically on a tall, rugged cliffside, enveloped by a dense, soft sea of swirling fog or clouds below. The castle features grey stone towers, red roofs, and flying banners. In the immediate foreground, a cobblestone path leads forward, bordered by lush grass, vibrant wildflowers, and rocks. Two small, cute characters stand on the path: a tiny chibi knight in polished silver armor and his small, friendly dragon companion. Golden hour lighting (sunrise or sunset), warm pastel colors, ultra detailed environment, depth of field.
